summary: This is a Federal Bureau of Prisons transfer receipt from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, dated August 9, 2019. It documents the transfer of an inmate with registration number 50501-054, which is associated with Jeffrey Epstein, from the custody of the US Marshals Service (USMS) to the Bureau of Prisons (BOP). The document is significant as it records the official custody transfer of Epstein shortly before his death.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The inmate being transferred, identified by his BOP registration number 50501-054, which is publicly known to be assigned to Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: Epstein transferred to BOP custody at MCC New York
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein was formally transferred from the custody of the US Marshals Service to the Bureau of Prisons at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York.

locations: MCC New York, 150 Park Row, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: The document is a Bureau of Prisons transfer receipt dated Friday, August 9, 2019.
It records the transfer of inmate with registration number 50501-054, which is Jeffrey Epstein's BOP number.
The transfer was from US Marshals Service (USMS) custody to Bureau of Prisons (BOP) custody at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York.
The document is an official record of Epstein's custody status just days before his death on August 10, 2019.
